thread.title: CPR Cell Phone Repair Continues Expansion with New Franchise Store in Tomball, TX
thread.title_full: CPR Cell Phone Repair Continues Expansion with New Franchise Store in Tomball, TX - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: CPR Cell Phone Repair Continues Expansion with New Franchise Store in Tomball, TX
text:
CPR Cell Phone Repair Continues Expansion with New Franchise Store in Tomball, TX
Independence, OH, October 16, 2015 --( PR.com )-- CPR Cell Phone Repair, the largest and fastest growing retail mobile device repair franchise network in North America, is pleased to announce the opening of a new store in Tomball, TX. New owner Jessica Farrar is warmly welcomed to CPR’s rapidly expanding network with the opening of her new franchise store in Tomball.
Farrar stated, “As a resident of the Houston area for over 25 years, I am delighted to have just opened a CPR franchise in nearby Tomball. I’m pleased to be part of CPR’s highly successful and rapidly expanding network of franchise stores. I am looking forward to delivering service to the Tomball community where I am affiliated with the business community and the Tomball Chamber of Commerce.”
Tomball is a small town located within the Houston metropolitan area. In 1933, the Humble Oil Company struck oil at the southwest side of Tomball earning the town the nickname of “Oiltown, USA.” The Humble Oil Company, now known as Exxon, and 20 other energy companies have worked the oil fields in the Tomball area for many years producing more than 100 million barrels of oil and 316 billion cubic feet of natural gas. Growth has continued in Tomball with over 80% of the homes built since 1970. The town also supports a diverse mix of small businesses and large companies. Tomball’s nearest neighbor is Spring, a more heavily populated town with a population of over 60,000 residents.
“CPR is very pleased that Jessica Farrar has joined our network as we continue to expand our footprint throughout Texas. She brings an accomplished mix of skills to her new endeavor with an extensive background in marketing, accounting and advertising with a Houston business brokerage firm. Jessica’s new CPR franchise store is conveniently located in the Tomball Town Center Kroger shopping center, making it an ideal location for busy consumers,” added Josh Sevick, CPR President.
CPR Cell Phone Repair of Tomball is located at 14040-B FM 2920, Tomball, TX 77377.
To learn more about the store’s full range of electronic device repair services, call 281-516-7808 or contact via e-mail at repairs@cpr-tomball.com.
For further information, visit the website: http://www.cellphonerepair.com/tomball-tx/
About CPR Cell Phone Repair
Founded in Orlando, Fla. in 1996, CPR Cell Phone Repair is the fastest growing wireless technology franchise in North America and operates 200 locations internationally. As a pioneer and leader in the electronics repair industry, CPR offers same-day repair and refurbishing services for cell phones, laptops, gaming systems, digital music players, tablets and other personal electronic devices. CPR was named an Entrepreneur Magazine Franchise 500 (2013) ranking and earning a top brand on the Inc. 500, CPR continues to lead the mobile device repair industry. For more information about CPR Cell Phone Repair and franchise opportunities, visit http://www.cellphonerepair.com/ or call 877-856-5101.
For further information, please contact:
Shari Kosec
Director, Onboarding and Franchisee Relations
CPR Cell Phone Repair
